DKA.Title: جداول النسبة الستنية على التمام والكامل; Ğadāwil al-nisbah al-sitt[ī]nīyah ʿalā al-tamām wal-kamāl

div.h4:
جداول النسبة الستنية على التمام والكامل
Ğadāwil al-nisbah al-sitt[ī]nīyah ʿalā al-tamām wal-kamāl
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Bought by either Carsten Niebuhr or Peter Forsskål ca. 1762 Calculation tables, where numbers are replaced with letters Nashi script Black and red ink Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 299-302]
div.div:
